column4: I have flashplugin-nonfree lsted as installed in Synaptic but it is not listed in about:plugins in my FireFox. Can someone please help ?
search google for "Adobe Flash Player Linux" the top result has step by step instructions
I'm not sure where you are pointing me, are you saying that I should not have the nonfree package loaded and I should download something direct from adobe ?
this page has all the instructions you should need http://www.adobe.com/shockwave/download/download.cgi?P1_Prod_Version=ShockwaveFlash&P2_Platform=Linux
